Summary: This was only like a quick 6 secs and its been bugging me
divs: Sighting DetailsAround the 4th of July I was looking up UFO's being on the moon, so since then not only I've been star gazing for UFO's but also looking at the moon for any strange activity. Actual Event: I was outside standing on my deck, watching the stars and the moon,between 1:30am-1:36am I saw the bright white light shooting away from the moon, it flashed once so it was like a decent gap between where the light was and the moon then it flash once more and it was gone, not a 3rd or a 4th flash. I know for a fact that an airlanes don't just turn their lighs off and the same with helicopters, and that they have more then one lights, I know other UFO's have multicolor lights but it was just 1 color 2 flashes.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Coopersburg
This sighting has never been favorited.
